item.title: An example post
item.description:
h2 header with 'header medium-header' class

Local events and meetups are great ways to get involved with other developers, learn, contribute, and make connections. Donâ€™t wait until you are ready to look for work: let it be a part of what it means for you to become a web developer in the first place.

h3 header with 'header small-header' class

Listening to technical and tech-light podcasts are a great way to ease yourself into the coding community. Check out these good ones:

  • Best podcasts for new coders
  • Sub-uls look like this:
    • Brooklyn Hackathon Events
    • AngelHack, a company that hosts hackathons in different cities.

And one more, plain h4

Hackathons are great for collaborating with other developers in an intense way to build brand new projects from the ground up.
